mapper.insert: insert into course(id, teacher_id, course_type, title, intro, price, lesson_num, cover, view_count, status, is_deleted, creation_time, update_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{teacher.id}, #{courseType.id}, #{title}, #{intro}, #{price}, #{lessonNum}, #{cover}, 0, 0, 0, #{creationTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update course
teacher_id = #{teacher.id},
course_type = #{courseType.id},
title = #{title},
intro = #{intro},
price = #{price},
lesson_num = #{lessonNum},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, teacher_id, title, intro, price, cover, view_count from course where status = 1 and is_deleted = 0
select id, teacher_id, course_type, title, intro, price, lesson_num, cover, view_count, status, creation_time from course where status = 1 and is_deleted = 0

select c.id, c.title, price, cover, view_count as 'viewCount' from course c join course_type ct on c.course_type = ct.id where
course_type = #{courseTypeId} and
price = #{price} and
(ct.title like #{search} or c.title like #{search}) and
status = 1 and c.is_deleted = 0 order by
c.creation_time desc
view_count desc
select id, teacher_id, title, intro, price, cover, view_count from course where teacher_id = #{id} and status = 1 and is_deleted = 0
select id, teacher_id, title, intro, price, cover, view_count from course where course_type = #{id} and status = 1 and is_deleted = 0
select id, teacher_id, title, intro, price, cover, view_count from course where title like #{title} and status = 1 and is_deleted = 0

select c.id, c.title, c.price, c.cover, c.view_count as 'viewCount' from course c join activity a on c.id = a.course_id join course_type ct on c.course_type = ct.id where
course_type = #{courseTypeId} and
(ct.title like #{search} or c.title like #{search}) and
status = 1 and c.is_deleted = 0 and a.is_deleted = 0 order by
c.creation_time desc
view_count desc

select c.id, c.title, c.price, c.cover, c.view_count as 'viewCount' from course c join sale s on c.id = s.course_id join course_type ct on c.course_type = ct.id where
course_type = #{courseTypeId} and
(ct.title like #{search} or c.title like #{search}) and
s.expiration_time >= NOW() and status = 1 and c.is_deleted = 0 and s.is_deleted = 0 order by
c.creation_time desc
view_count desc

select c.id, c.teacher_id, c.course_type, c.title, c.`describe`, c.intro, c.price, c.lesson_num, c.cover, c.view_count, t.name, t.intro as 't.intro', t.avatar, ct.title as 'ct.title' from course c join teacher t on c.teacher_id = t.id join course_type ct on c.course_type = ct.id where c.id = #{id} and c.is_deleted = 0
